definition: parent material (e.g. the eroded rock making up sediment)

sentences.english: and macromolecular clumps of organic material called kerogen.
sentences.chinese: 最後是一種叫做油母質的大分子化合物。

sentences.english: The matrix, or inferior portion, includes the lowermost part of the follicle and the hair bulb.
sentences.chinese: 毛母質或許下部，包括毛囊的最下部和毛球。

sentences.english: The subsoil underneath is the earth from which the soil was made and is called the parent material .
sentences.chinese: 下面的亞土壤是土壤起始形成的地方，稱爲母質。

sentences.english: The factors influencing the content of hydrous micas were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明母質是影響粘粒雲母含量的主要因素。

sentences.english: The parent material for the two locations is river alluvial soil.
sentences.chinese: 兩個地點土壤母質爲河流沖積土。

sentences.english: Volatilization of ammonia from latosol soils with different matrixes was evaluated in the present study.
sentences.chinese: 針對不同母質磚紅壤中氨的揮發損失進行了研究。

sentences.english: Which the soil was made and is called the parent material.
sentences.chinese: 下面的亞土壤是土壤起始形成的地方，稱爲母質。

sentences.english: The boron content in soil depends upon the parent materials of soil.
sentences.chinese: 土壤硼含量決定於成土母質。

sentences.english: Soil Cu content primarily depend on its parent material.
sentences.chinese: 土壤銅含量決定於母質類型。

sentences.english: Oil-generating Parent material kerogen is the important target in petroleum geology study.
sentences.chinese: 生油母質乾酪根是石油地質工作研究的重要對象。
